title: NLP Project
description: Will update in late March 2025.

title: Deep Learning Project
description: Will update in late March 2025.

title: Digital Design and Fabrication Collection
description: Will update in late March 2025.

title: Ethics of Artificial Intelligence in Crime
description: This project addresses bias in pretrial release algorithms by using the AIF360 library to assess and mitigate inequities in training data, ensuring fairer outcomes in judicial system.

title: Building Resilience in Coastal Communities During Hurricanes
description: This project addresses the challenges hurricanes pose to coastal communities by developing a risk assessment model and an interactive tool. It empowers health groups to allocate resources effectively and helps individuals make informed decisions.

title: Galactic Dreamscape
description: An immersive installation transports participants into a galactic dreamscape, blending particle effects, fluid simulations, and NASA datasets. The installation forms a symbiotic relationship between humans and the universe, using Stable Diffusion and immersive audio for a full sensory experience.

title: TinyML Device for Emotion Detection
description: This project aims to develop an emotion-sensing device that analyzes speech using machine learning models and a microphone to detect and respond to a person’s emotional state in real-time. The device provides visual feedback through colored LED lights, creating an immersive environment that reflects the user’s emotions.

title: Bionic Balance
description: This art instllation explores the relationship between humans and nature through the evolution of Earth’s landscapes, from oceans to desserts, showcasing the delicate balance between technology and the natural world.

title: TutorPup
description: An educational robot that makes use of the Mini Pupper 2 quadruped robot. It aims to improve students’ learning experience through the use of personalized question decks and enforce retrieval practice when reviewing each question.

title: HUES (Heartfelt Utterances Emotive Strokes)
description: Can art help us figure out our feelings better? Art can make us feel a lot of different things.

title: Magnetic Alchemy
description: An art installation blending electronic technologies with the raw beauty of natural elements to create an ever-changing visual experience.

title: Recommendation Strategy of Kuaishou
description: The analysis of Kuaishou's recommender system involves evaluating machine learning models to enhance friend and video suggestions, with varying accuracies and real-time adaptation features.

title: Green Thumbs
description: An automated plant watering system designed to constantly monitor plant health, automate watering, and allow remote management.

title: Global Soccer Visualization
description: This project offers magazine-style visuals and commentary, illuminating soccer's global impact through engaging graphics and insightful context.

title: FlexBody
description: An Android fitness app for tracking exercise and nutrition, maintaining lists, and sharing progress through pictures.

title: Climate Justice Website
description: This project involved creating a climate justice website with React, featuring an educational flashcard section and a community board for collaborative dialogue and resources.

title: Protein Prediction Power
description: This project aims to predict the protein content in recipes using nutritional information and tags. It employs regression modeling, starting with a linear model and advancing to a Random Forest Regressor.

title: Living on the Edge
description: This project combines art and game design using JavaScript and p5.js to create an interactive experience that highlights the effects of climate change on ecosystems and encourages users to make environmentally conscious decisions.

title: Tasty Data
description: This project involves a dataset with 83,782 unique recipes and corresponding reviews and ratings. The data spans from 2008 to 2018, and the aim is to analyze trends in recipe changes over time, focusing on protein content.

title: Chromatic Cataclysm
description: An interactive film blending visuals and sounds, exploring climate change impacts and AI, urging reflection and environmental action.

title: Open Energy Dashboard
description: An open-source project addresses dynamic OED page buttons, making them fixed with the current page marked (e.g., grayed out) for better usability.
